name: Helsinki
info: Mirko Dragic, mostly known by his alias Helsinki, is one of the main characters in the Netflix series Money Heist, portrayed by actor Darko Perić.

name: Berlin

name: Tokyo
info: Silene Oliveira, better known by her code-name Tokyo (  es.  Tokio ), is one of the main protagonists of the Netflix series Money Heist, as well as the narrator of the story. She is a member of the heist crew set to rob the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Denver

name: Marseille
info: Luka Peroš (born 26 October 1976) is a Croatian actor best known for the role of Marseille in Money Heist.
FirstAppearance: The Three Men of Melita Žganjer (1998)
